Public MustOverride Function GetBinder (configuration As HttpConfiguration, modelType As Type) As IModelBinder
abstract member GetBinder : System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration * Type -> System.Web.Http.ModelBinding.IModelBinder

Docs.param: The type of the model to bind against.
Docs.summary: Finds a binder for the given type.
Docs.returns: A binder, which can attempt to bind this type. Or null if the binder knows statically that it will never be able to bind the type.
